SET(MAJOR 6)
SET(MINOR 3)
SET(NAME mongoose)

EXTERNALPROJECT_ADD(${NAME}
    PREFIX ${NAME}
    URL https://github.com/cesanta/${NAME}/archive/${MAJOR}.${MINOR}.tar.gz TIMEOUT 30
    INSTALL_DIR ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/local
    PATCH_COMMAND patch -p1 < ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake.patch
    CMAKE_ARGS -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE} -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=<INSTALL_DIR> -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE}
)
